mapper.select: SELECT option_id, option_price, option_type, option_name, option_image, preview FROM car_name_interior JOIN options ON car_name_interior.interior_id = options.option_id WHERE car_name_id = #{carNameId};

SELECT option_id, option_price, option_type, option_name, option_image, preview FROM car_name_exterior JOIN options ON car_name_exterior.exterior_id = options.option_id WHERE car_name_id = #{carNameId};

SELECT options.option_id, option_price, option_type, option_name, option_image, preview FROM model_option JOIN options ON options.option_type = 'interior' AND model_option.option_id = options.option_id WHERE model_id = #{modelId};

SELECT options.option_id, option_price, option_type, option_name, option_image, preview FROM model_option JOIN options ON options.option_type = 'exterior' AND model_option.option_id = options.option_id WHERE model_id = #{modelId};

SELECT options.option_id, option_price, option_type, option_name, option_image, preview FROM model_option JOIN options ON model_option.option_id = options.option_id WHERE model_id = #{model_id} AND option_type != 'exterior' AND option_type != 'interior';

SELECT options.option_id, option_price, option_type, option_name, option_image, preview FROM model_option mo1 JOIN required_options ON mo1.id = required_options.model_option_id JOIN model_option mo2 ON mo2.id = required_options.required_id JOIN options ON mo2.option_id = options.option_id WHERE mo1.is_required = true AND mo1.option_id = #{optionId} AND mo1.model_id = #{modelId};

SELECT options.option_id, option_price, option_type, option_name, option_image, preview FROM model_option mo1 JOIN exclusive_options ex1 ON mo1.id = ex1.model_option_id JOIN exclusive_options ex2 ON ex1.exclusive_group = ex2.exclusive_group AND ex1.id != ex2.id JOIN model_option mo2 ON ex2.model_option_id = mo2.id JOIN options ON mo2.option_id = options.option_id WHERE mo1.is_exclusive = true AND mo2.is_exclusive = true AND mo1.option_id = #{optionId} AND mo1.model_id = #{modelId};

SELECT options.option_id, option_price, option_type, option_name, option_image, preview FROM model_option mo1 JOIN required_options ON mo1.id = required_options.required_id JOIN model_option mo2 ON mo2.id = required_options.model_option_id JOIN options ON mo2.option_id = options.option_id WHERE mo1.option_id = #{optionId} AND mo1.model_id = #{modelId};
